name: proven
description: FFI binding to libproven - formally verified safety library. Safe math, string escaping, path traversal prevention, email/URL validation, and more. All computation is performed in verified Idris 2 code via the Zig FFI layer.
releasenote: Initial Haxe binding release with SafeMath, SafeString, SafePath, SafeEmail, SafeUrl, SafeNetwork, SafeCrypto, SafeJson, and SafeDateTime modules.
